title: Madonna’s newly-adopted twin daughters are bonding with their new siblings. See photo | music | Hindustan Times
text:
Desimartini Madonna’s newly-adopted twin daughters are bonding with their new siblings. See photo 
The 68-year-old music icon took to Instagram to post a photograph of the happy family, enjoying a cosy, homely pyjama party. music Updated: Feb 24, 2017 16:45 IST PTI Los Angeles Earlier, she had shared a heart-warming video of the twin girls singing Twinkle, Twinkle Little Star on social media.(AP) 
Pop diva Madonna has shared a picture of her four adopted children, including the recently taken-in eight-year-old twin daughters from Malawi. 
The 68-year-old music icon took to Instagram to post a photograph of the happy family, enjoying a cosy, homely pyjama party. Feb 22, 2017 at 1:17pm PST 
“Pyjama Game on... The Revolution of (love) starts at home!” wrote Madonna, along side the photo. 
Apart from Stella and Esther Mwale, the picture also shows, the Papa Don’t Preach singer’s other adopted children, also from Malawi, David Banda, 11 and Mercy, 11, bonding with the newest family members. Read more
